title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.23 - Compressed gases referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.23 - Compressed gases referenced to this section

State Regulations
(a) Compressed gases listed in section
1211.150
and referenced to this
section are not restricted, regardless of quantity or size of
containers. (b) No tank vehicle, loaded or empty, is allowed passage if the vehicle is used for the
transportation of any compressed gas referenced to this
section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
